overview: The director of "DOES YOUR GOD EXIST?" which won the runner-up prize at the PFF Awards 2013, is set in a props company. The film opens with a long scene of an old man and a young woman working together in a friendly atmosphere. After drawing the audience into the scene of the workshop that follows, a small incident occurs and the film vividly transforms into a psychological drama.
title: The Lie and the Taint
